languages.text: "Чем больше вы стараетесь сокрыть от меня свои цвета, мастер ван Калокс, тем отчетливей я их вижу. Если вам столь неприятен мой взор — просто скажите".
"The more you try to hide your colours from me, Master van Calox, the more clearly I can see them. If you find my gaze so unpleasant, just say so."
languages.original_text: "Чем больше вы стараетесь сокрыть от меня свои цвета, мастер ван Калокс, тем отчетливей я их вижу. Если вам столь неприятен мой взор — просто скажите".

traits.locale_text: "The more you try to hide your colours from me, Master van Calox, the more clearly I can see them. If you find my gaze so unpleasant, just say so."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The more you try to hide your colours from me, Master van Calox, the more clearly I can see them. If you find my gaze so unpleasant, just say so."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The more you try to hide your colours from me, Master van Calox, the more clearly I can see them. If you find my gaze so unpleasant, just say so."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The more you try to hide your colours from me, Master van Calox, the more clearly I can see them. If you find my gaze so unpleasant, just say so."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “冯·卡洛克斯大师，你越是想藏起你的颜色，我就看得越是分明。如果你感到我的目光令人不快，请告诉我。”
languages.original_text: "The more you try to hide your colours from me, Master van Calox, the more clearly I can see them. If you find my gaze so unpleasant, just say so."

traits.locale_text: “冯·卡洛克斯大师，你越是想藏起你的颜色，我就看得越是分明。如果你感到我的目光令人不快，请告诉我。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Plus vous essayez de dissimuler vos véritables couleurs et plus elles m'apparaissent clairement, maître van Calox. Si mon regard vous déplaît à ce point, il vous suffit de me le dire. »
languages.original_text: "The more you try to hide your colours from me, Master van Calox, the more clearly I can see them. If you find my gaze so unpleasant, just say so."

traits.locale_text: « Plus vous essayez de dissimuler vos véritables couleurs et plus elles m'apparaissent clairement, maître van Calox. Si mon regard vous déplaît à ce point, il vous suffit de me le dire. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Je mehr Ihr versucht, Eure Farben vor mir zu verbergen, Meister van Calox, desto klarer kann ich sie sehen. Wenn Ihr meinen Blick so unangenehm findet, sagt es einfach."
languages.original_text: "The more you try to hide your colours from me, Master van Calox, the more clearly I can see them. If you find my gaze so unpleasant, just say so."

traits.locale_text: "Je mehr Ihr versucht, Eure Farben vor mir zu verbergen, Meister van Calox, desto klarer kann ich sie sehen. Wenn Ihr meinen Blick so unangenehm findet, sagt es einfach."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「マスター・ヴァン・カロックス、あなたが色を隠そうとすればするほど、はっきり見えてきます。私の視線がそんなに不快なら、そう言ってください」
languages.original_text: "The more you try to hide your colours from me, Master van Calox, the more clearly I can see them. If you find my gaze so unpleasant, just say so."

traits.locale_text: 「マスター・ヴァン・カロックス、あなたが色を隠そうとすればするほど、はっきり見えてきます。私の視線がそんなに不快なら、そう言ってください」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Cuanto más intenta ocultarme sus colores, más visibles me resultan, maestro van Calox. Si tan molesta le resulta mi mirada, dígamelo».
languages.original_text: "The more you try to hide your colours from me, Master van Calox, the more clearly I can see them. If you find my gaze so unpleasant, just say so."

traits.locale_text: «Cuanto más intenta ocultarme sus colores, más visibles me resultan, maestro van Calox. Si tan molesta le resulta mi mirada, dígamelo».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: "The more you try to hide your colours from me, Master van Calox, the more clearly I can see them. If you find my gaze so unpleasant, just say so."

languages.text: "Renklerini benden saklamaya çalıştıkça daha da belirginleşiyorlar Üstat van Calox. Bakışlarımı nahoş buluyorsan söylemen yeterli."
languages.original_text: "The more you try to hide your colours from me, Master van Calox, the more clearly I can see them. If you find my gaze so unpleasant, just say so."

traits.locale_text: "Renklerini benden saklamaya çalıştıkça daha da belirginleşiyorlar Üstat van Calox. Bakışlarımı nahoş buluyorsan söylemen yeterli."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
